meanings.definition: A salt or ester of oxalacetic acid.
meanings.sent1: I added a pinch of oxalacetate to the experiment mixture.
meanings.sent2: The oxalacetate dissolved completely in the solution.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled oxalacetate all over the lab bench.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like oxalacetate - essential and binding.
meanings.sent5: The bright white crystals of oxalacetate sparkled under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A key intermediate in the citric acid cycle.
meanings.sent1: The production of energy in cells relies on oxalacetate.
meanings.sent2: Oxalacetate plays a crucial role in converting nutrients into energy.
meanings.sent3: The citric acid cycle party was a hit, with oxalacetate as the star dancer.
meanings.sent4: In the dance of metabolism, oxalacetate leads the way.
meanings.sent5: The citric acid cycle is like a well-choreographed dance, with oxalacetate as the conductor.
